column4: where do i find my usb devices? I shall do this "sudo chmod 777 /proc/bus/usb/busid/deviceid" but that path does not exists on my machine -> natty 64bit
what you are trying to do?
would you mind to tell us what tutorial?
i just need to make that usb device user writeable thats it
well. that's what i asked, why you need to make raw device writable? altering something under proc means that in next boot changes you made are gone
tutorial says so, i dunno why
well, that's why i asked you to give this tutorial :)
i guess i know why ;) if i try to calibrate with the tool mentioned in the tutorial it gives me a access denied (insufficient permission) error
so now my question remains, how do i do it and can i do i permanent (if its a good idea to do so)
i'm sorry, but i don't know how to handle this with correct way :-/
there's what you were looking for at first
